definition: with one's face covered in tears (idiom)
pinyin: yi1 ba3 yan3 lei4 yi1 ba3 bi2 ti4

definition: a slug/sb with a runny nose

sentences.english: Dirty air or air-borne garbage causes stinging eyes and running nose.
sentences.chinese: 肮脏的空气或空气传播的垃圾引起眼睛刺痛和流鼻涕。

sentences.english: Purulent nasal discharge had statistical difference between biyuanshu group and control group.
sentences.chinese: 脓鼻涕鼻渊舒组和对照组有统计学差异。
你这个满脸鼻涕的老头子。

sentences.english: So in the case of a long-running nose, it's best to let each nose run its course.
sentences.chinese: 因此在长期流鼻涕的情况下，最好不管它。

sentences.english: I ask as I splutter into a tissue.
sentences.chinese: 我一边拿纸巾擤鼻涕一边问他。

sentences.english: He wiped his fingers on his trousersbefore going indoors.
sentences.chinese: 他用裤子将手指上的鼻涕揩干净，然后才回到屋内。

sentences.english: "There isn't any significant nutritional content in nasal mucus," says Andrade.
sentences.chinese: “鼻涕中没有任何重要的营养含量”，安德拉德说。

sentences.english: Common cold symptoms are runny nose, sore throat and headache.
sentences.chinese: 一般的感冒症状也就是流流鼻涕，喉咙疼和头疼。

sentences.english: I have a runny nose and a scratchy throat.
sentences.chinese: 我流鼻涕，嗓子还又疼又哑。

sentences.english: Blowing your nose too hard can cause earache.
sentences.chinese: 擤鼻涕太用力会造成耳痛。

sentences.english: Common symptoms of vasomotor rhinitis are often nasal congestion and postnasal drip.
sentences.chinese: 血管运动性鼻炎的常见症状是经常鼻塞，鼻涕倒流。

sentences.english: The more common symptoms are nasal discharge , poor appetite, and lethargy.
sentences.chinese: 比较常见的征状是流鼻涕，食欲不佳以及昏睡。

sentences.english: Swarly the squishy slug softly sings some silly songs.
sentences.chinese: 软软的鼻涕虫斯华利，在轻轻地唱着一些傻傻的歌。

sentences.english: I'm sneezing and my nose is running.
sentences.chinese: 我打喷嚏而且还流鼻涕。
